q: Grizzlies in Carmelo Anthony 's return Allen Iverson raced downcourt and floated an alley-oop lob that Carmelo Anthony shoved one-handed through the hoop for an arena-rattling jam, one that seemed to holler to all their doubters,`` Take that!'' We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together, Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night.`` We know there's a lot of doubt about that.''
